name: Nuun Sport Electrolyte Replacement Tablets Tropical
description: Electrolyte-replacing drink tablets in a little portable tube. Great for endurance events, long bike rides and hikes, or any other event that requires a quick boost.Lightly flavoured with mango, pineapple, and coconut.Revised formula contains no preservatives or artificial sweeteners, now contains non-GMO dextrose and stevia as sweeteners.Dissolve one tablet in 500ml to 650ml water.Contains 10 tablets.Ingredients: dextrose, citric acid, natural flavors, calcium carbonate, monk fruit extract, stevia leaf extract, avocado oil, beet root juice powder (for color), riboflavin (for color).
